channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- EU Cookie Law for GDPR/CCPA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- EU Cookie Law for GDPR/CCPA

item.title: CVE-2022-3811|2024-08-03T01:20:58.446Z -- unknown -- eu%20cookie%20law%20for%20gdpr%2Fccpa
item.description: The EU Cookie Law for GDPR/CCPA WordPress plugin through 3.1.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
